::Shadow Wing::

She swooped down and fired optic lazars at Pyro.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Oinker/Zergling/Punch/The Oblitercons:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Hiss rolled, letting the flames miss him.  He raised his launcher, 
firing a 
> rocket off at Icedragon's chest.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro fired off three fire balls, two at the first rocket coming 
towards him, 
> the last at the other one, the heat possibly able to overheat the 
rockets and 
> cause them to prematurely explode.  He rolled to the right several 
feet just 
> to be cautious.
> 
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One laughed as his cockpit glass cracked, deciding this fight 
was 
> worthless.  He dived down, firing off two missiles downward at 
Steel.
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown fired off a grenade set to explode on impact at Shocker's 
torso, 
> laughing.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scavenger swerved, a few shots digging into his side, missing 
anything vital 
> by inches.  He fired off 20 shells from each machine gun, a total 
of 40, as 
> he charged Icedragon at full speed, the fourty shells heading for 
that 
> Maximal.
> 
> 
> ===
> 
> Punch hopped off of Oinker's tractor mode, missile launcher at the 
ready.  He 
> fired off a rocket at the Ark.
> 
> ---
> 
> Zergling hopped off Oinker.  "For Zardus!" he screamed, taking out 
his 
> rapid-firing laser rifle, firing off twenty bolts at Shadow Wing 
who was in 
> the air.
>  
> ---
> 
> Oinker transformed.  "Finuhly, a challenge for me.  I reckon we'll 
kick Maxi 
> tail." he said, firing off three laser bolts from his laser rifle 
at a 
> semi-repaired autogun.
